name: Four-Cheese Pizza With Basil
recipeYield: 1 large, 2 medium, or more smaller pizzas
keywords: fontina, mozzarella, pizza dough, main course, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup shredded or cubed fontina or taleggio
1/2 cup coarsely chopped or torn basil

recipeInstructions.text: Top dough with all cheeses. Bake about 10 minutes, or until nearly done. Sprinkle with basil and finish baking.
